name: Log Transporter
description:
Controls:

A D for turning the car

J L for turning the log

This should've been a submission for the Kenney Jam with the theme rotation, but I kinda forgot the time and wasn't able to even finish a prototype ... sometimes my genius is ... it's almost frightening (the dumb idea for this game originated from this)
